Package weka.core.neighboursearch.kdtrees

Class Summary
KDTreeNode A class representing a KDTree node.
KDTreeNodeSplitter Class that splits up a KDTreeNode.
KMeansInpiredMethod The class that splits a node into two such that the overall sum of squared distances of points to their centres on both sides of the (axis-parallel) splitting plane is minimum.

For more information see also:

Ashraf Masood Kibriya (2007).
MedianOfWidestDimension The class that splits a KDTree node based on the median value of a dimension in which the node's points have the widest spread.

For more information see also:

Jerome H.
MidPointOfWidestDimension The class that splits a KDTree node based on the midpoint value of a dimension in which the node's points have the widest spread.

For more information see also:

Andrew Moore (1991).
SlidingMidPointOfWidestSide The class that splits a node into two based on the midpoint value of the dimension in which the node's rectangle is widest.
